dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.
dependencies.name: pil

dependencies.description:
data distribution geared toward scientific datasets. DataLad makes data
management and data distribution more accessible. To do that, it stands
on the shoulders of Git and Git-annex to deliver a decentralized system
for data exchange. This includes automated ingestion of data from online
portals and exposing it in readily usable form as Git(-annex)
repositories, so-called datasets. The actual data storage and permission
management, however, remains with the original data providers.
dependencies.name: py-datalad

dependencies.description: Read Exif metadata from tiff and jpeg files.
dependencies.name: py-exifread

dependencies.description: Read and write audio tags for many formats.
dependencies.name: py-mutagen

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Python XMP Toolkit for working with metadata.
dependencies.name: py-python-xmp-toolkit

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyyaml

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
Fast, pure-Python full text indexing, search, and spell checking
library.
dependencies.name: py-whoosh

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: DataLad extension for semantic metadata handling
dependent_to.name: py-datalad-metalad

dependent_to.description: DataLad extension package for neuro/medical imaging
dependent_to.name: py-datalad-neuroimaging

description:
DataLad extension package for deprecated functionality that was phased
out in the core package.
